short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the coding experience inside ServiceNow. (Available for ServiceNow instances with Utah version or newer).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
v1.0.2
- Fixes to manifest.json file

v1.0.1
- Added automatic smooth scroll to editor instances
- Added automatic zoom to editor instances (CTRL + Scroll)
